content.en: Algorithmic healthcare analysis: Algorithms are being used to accurately identify quality-of-care indicators from State health department databases, identify potential in-hospital patient safety problems, and calculate the accuracy of the Agency for Healthcare Research and Quality (AHRQ) Failure to Rescue (FTR) algorithm. These algorithms are also being adapted to international hospital data, used to flag 'present on admission' conditions in hospital data, and identify surgical adverse events. Additionally, algorithms are being developed to identify health outcomes, detect healthcare-associated infections, and identify patients with severe sepsis using administrative data.
content.da: Algoritmisk sundhedsanalyse: Algoritmer bruges til præcist at identificere kvalitetsindikatorer for pleje fra Statens sundhedsafdelings databaser, identificere potentielle patientikkerhedsproblemer på hospitalet og beregne nøjagtigheden af ​​Agency for Healthcare Research and Quality (AHRQ) Failure to Rescue (FTR) algoritmen. Disse algoritmer tilpasses også til internationale hospitaldata, bruges til at markere 'til stede ved indlæggelse' betingelser i hospitaldata og identificere kirurgiske bivirkninger. Derudover udvikles algoritmer for at identificere sundhedsresultater, opdage sundhedsassocierede infektioner og identificere patienter med svær sepsis ved hjælp af administrative data.
